1.0.name: wordpress/autolinks
1.0.description:
Live demo
Autolinks is a very smart wordpress plugin, it automatically generate a hyper links for images of the post summary. For category list,search result etc, if topic summary have images, autolinks will generate hyper links for these images, these hyper links will link to the topic’s full text. Additionally, Autolinks can also automatically generate title and alt information for images when they are lack of them. Thus, Autolinks can improve both human friendly and search engine friendly.

More Description
